#summary Hello! This is main wiki page of Rowboat project.

= Rowboat project brings latest Android on Omap3 platforms =

== Goals of the project: ==
  * Provide stable Google Android port for Omap3 platforms
  * Enable Omap3 hardware features (*DSP*, *Neon*, and a few others)

== Key differentiators among many others: ==
  * Quality of Android port
  * Graphics and Multimedia performance optimizations
  * Complete support of Beagleboard and Omap3EVM (a few more to follow soon)
  * Focus on Testing and Benchmarking
  * Android Compliance compatibility

== Who might be interested in this project: ==
  * ODMs that not tied to handset/wireless market : (name markets here)
  * Companies planning to use Android with Omap3 

== Who are main contributors: ==
  * Mentor Graphics
  * Texas Instrument
